package.name: syslinux
package.unpack: mkdir extlinux mkdir syslinux-common mkdir isolinux cd extlinux ar x ${SRCDIR}/extlinux_6.04~git20190206.bf6db5b4+dfsg1-3ubuntu1_amd64.deb tar xf data.tar.zst cd ../syslinux-common ar x ${SRCDIR}/syslinux-common_6.04~git20190206.bf6db5b4+dfsg1-3ubuntu1_all.deb tar xf data.tar.zst cd ../isolinux ar x ${SRCDIR}/isolinux_6.04~git20190206.bf6db5b4+dfsg1-3ubuntu1_all.deb tar xf data.tar.zst
package.build: echo 'Using pre-built binaries from Ubuntu, nothing to build!'
package.install:
# test -f ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/extlinux/extlinux || exit 1
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/static/sbin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/sbin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/etc/syslinux
#install -m 0755 syslinux.dynamic ${TGTDIR}/usr/sbin/syslinux #install -m 0755 extlinux.dynamic ${TGTDIR}/usr/sbin/extlinux
install -m 0755 extlinux/usr/bin/extlinux ${TGTDIR}/static/sbin/extlinux install -m 0755 extlinux/usr/bin/extlinux ${TGTDIR}/usr/sbin/extlinux
install -m 0644 isolinux/usr/lib/ISOLINUX/isolinux.bin ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux # install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/bios/core/pxelinux.bin ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux # install -m 0644 ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/gpxe/pxelinux.gpxe ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux
for f in menu.c32 vesamenu.c32 ifcpu.c32 ifcpu64.c32 reboot.c32 chain.c32 ldlinux.c32 libutil.c32 libmenu.c32 \ libcom32.c32 liblua.c32 libgpl.c32 ; do install -m 0644 syslinux-common/usr/lib/syslinux/modules/bios/${f} ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux/ done for f in mbr.bin gptmbr.bin ; do install -m 0644 syslinux-common/usr/lib/syslinux/mbr/ ${TGTDIR}/etc/syslinux done for f in syslinux-common/usr/lib/syslinux/mbr/extra/*.bin syslinux-common/usr/lib/syslinux/mbr/*.bin ; do install -m 0644 $f ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux/ done for f in isolinux/usr/lib/ISOLINUX/*.bin ; do install -m 0644 $f ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/syslinux/ done
